titles.title: Come Holy Ghost Our Hearts Inspire

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come, Holy Ghost, our hearts inspire; newline Let us Thine influence prove: newline Source of the old prophetic fire, newline Fountain of life and love.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Come, Holy Ghost for moved by Thee newline The prophets wrote and spoke. newline Unlock the truth, Thyself the key; newline Unseal the Sacred Book.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: God, through Himself, we then shall know newline If Thou within us shine, newline And sound with all Thy saints below, newline The depths of love divine.
